data.message: When I heard that your retiring after this album I instantly started crying. You are my idol... My inspiration. You went through so much, and overcame it all. Your a success story... You remind me so much of my dad. I love your music so much. Everybody retires... It's just life. I hope you and  your daughter have an amazing life together. I will always idolize you.

replies.message:
Dont believe everything you hear
I been hearing he's gona retire since recovery 
And in his last album, i cant remember what song, he says that he's done, but here he is blessing us with another one of his masterpieces.
Never know what the rap god has planned for us lol
